ComicInfo.Summary:
In the second issue of the all-new ongoing Bob’s Burgers comic book series, we bring you all new stories, each more delicious than the last: Raised by apes, Jungle Tina swings into the big city and into an explorer’s heart; Gene’s sheer boredom leads to the discovery of a magical world in need of saving; and Louise finds a ride at Wonder Wharf that has a mysterious power besides the power to make kids throw up! It’s Belcher Family Fun from the actual show writers and animators of Bob’s Burgers, the wildly popular animated sitcom that airs on Fox television alongside such hits as The Simpsons and Family Guy!
Story TitlesTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Jungle TinaLouise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities: The Ride, part 1Gene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: The Kids, The Witch and the Coat Closet*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Cover A | Brittany McCarthy | 1 | B/Reg | Cover B | Rudy de la Cruz | 3 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Variant Cover | Rudy de la Cruz | 4 | D/RE | ComicXposure Exclusive Variant Cover | Frank Forte | 2 |

ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Aguinaldo, Derek Schroeder, Emiko Sawanobori, Joe Healy, Mario D'Anna, Steven Theis

ComicInfo.Characters: Andy Poplopovich, Bob Belcher, Calvin Fischoeder, Darryl, Gayle, Gene Belcher, Gretchen, Hugo Habercore, Jimmy Pesto Jr., Jimmy Pesto Sr., Jocelyn, Linda Belcher, Louise Belcher, Mort, Mr. Frond, Ollie Poplopovich, Teddy, Tina Belcher, Zeke
